refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: sciFLT is a Fuzzy Logic Toolbox designed to scilab, using scilab, FORTRAN and C code.

listitem.para: At this stage, sciFLT work with Mamdani and Takagi-Sugeno Fuzzy logic systems.
Member functions, S-Norm, T-Norm, Complement and Fuzzy Logic System (fls) are supported. Also include a palette.
sciFLT have an embedded editor written in TCL/TK.
